MyOrganization.Content:
以下是貴公司名下的司機被 DOT 抽查抽中要做尿检。請通知司機尽快在 #Date#前到我們診所來做 DOT 的隨机的尿检抽查，是免費的。

如果司機未能在限期内实行，他的 DOT 毒品和/或酒精测试会员將被 “取消”并将被视为“拒绝”了该测试。

如果以下司機已辭職了，請EMAIL我們說明司机在那月份離職。請提供所有已離職司機名單和註明要求取消，以及另外名單列出所有正在貴公司工作的司機。


公司名：
#CompanyName#


司机被抽查中：
#DonorList#


六天營業（不需預約）
周一到周五：10:00am - 6:00pm
周六           ：休息
周日           ：10:00am - 3:00pm

體檢中心地址

謝謝

體檢中心陳小姐



Hi there

You company driver/s(see below) have been selected for drug and/or alcohol testing for DOT program of random selection.

Please inform below driver/s come to our clinic immediately or before  #Date# for the random testing. It‘s Free of charge. If driver fail to arrive within the reasonable amount of time allowed driver will be deemed to have refused the test and will be removed from DOT drug and/or alcohol testing program.

If below driver no longer working for your company If below driver NO longer working for your company please provide us 2 lists as follow

  1. A list to show ALL drivers who are NO longer working for the company and request their memberships to be cancelled. We will process the termination and remove them from the program.
  2. A list for drivers who are currently working for the company. 

Company name:
#CompanyName#


Selected driver/s for random test
#DonorList#


Business Hours
Mon - Fri:  10:00am to 6:00pm
Sat         :   Close
Sunday  :  10:00am to 3:00pm
